-2-
4. The committee will take no action which will infringe in any way with
the activities of local organizations already active in planning or
developing a program of Educational Television.
5. The committee favors working with the national organizations created
to promote Educational Television.
6. The committee should continue to assist Educational Television in
California by dissemination of information, carrying on and supporting
research projects, and aid to those local groups who desire advice
and assistance.
January 28, 1954
